tool_description: Routes customer notifications to appropriate communication channels based on customer preferences and message urgency.

message_content.description: The notification message to be sent

error_messages: Customer not found: The specified customer_id does not exist in the system.
Invalid urgency level: Must be one of [low, medium, high].
No available channels: Customer has no configured communication channels.
Channel service unavailable: One or more communication services are down.
Invalid channel: One or more channels in preferred_channels are not supported.
usage: Provide customer_id, message_content, message_subject, and urgency_level. Optionally override channel preferences with preferred_channels array.

delivery_channels.description: Channels where the message will be delivered

delivery_status.description: Overall delivery status: sent, failed, or partial

channel_results.description: Individual delivery results for each channel
